venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
﻿﻿﻿Join us every first Friday of the month for our ongoing community gathering wtih the Green Lotus Project.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Want to try a delightful, stress-reducing exercise that has been recommended by Oprah, Dr. Oz, and Dr. Andrew Weil? Want to learn simple techniques to help you stay positive in challenging situations? Want to meet other laughter-loving folks?   Want to feel so relaxed – as if you were chilling on the beach in the Bahamas?

Try Laughter Yoga!  

We use laughter as exercise, and we play simple games and do deep breathing techniques.  Participating is fun and easy! People of all physical abilities and ages are welcome. 

CLOTHING/WATER: Comfortable clothing and shoes are recommended. Yoga mats not necessary. A water bottle is also a good idea

MORE INFO: www.ctlaugh.com

TIME: Laughter Yoga 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm. $5 donation

FIRST FRIDAYS High Vibe Trance Dance via the Green Lotus Project 8 pm - midnight FREE! unlimited infrared sauna & oxygen bar for only $10 

http://www.greenlotusproject.org



Heartbeat Friday is a First of it's kind in Connecticut. This is a Permaculture based dance event. We are exploring sustainable health, agriculture and community. As we come together to share, dance and unwind we are surrounded in an environment that is conducive to personal growth, awareness and healing. It is time we got together and discussed these topics that have been so frequently on our minds!
*****Attention*****
This is a free event. save the money you would have used on a cover charge and buy some herbs, superfoods, organic food, smoothy, healing session and or anything else that will benefit your mind and body. Ohh yeh and there is a nice sauna here that can warm your winter bones up! Also a massage room, oxygen bar and an organic juice bar/cafe. I dont know what else you could ask for?
*****Music*****
For now I have been playing fluting grooves, hilight tribe, beats antique, shpongle and all sorts of good organic dance tunes. Please let me know if you have any musical talent to offer the event! We have a few drums here but would love to see real instruments pop out. 
****Notes*****
This is a booze and drug free event. Take one evening and feel yourself in your original state, free of other spirits. With the right dance, medicines, foods and vibrations you can reach highs without the alcohol and drugs.
*****Black Light*****
What do you know about black lights. We've got some string art, lycra installation and room for more. Come glowing and art showing!!!!
item.name: Laughter Yoga & High Vibe Trance Dance Party
